question: 在设计密苏里州中部的土壤健康与玉米产量关系研究时，研究人员为何选择分布在六个主要土地资源区（MLRA）的84块田地，并关注不同排水类型与历史农业活动的遗留影响？
answer: 研究选取覆盖六个MLRA的84块田地，涵盖了以smectitic黏土矿物为主的Mollisol和Alfisol等土壤类型，以及从适中排水、良好排水到排水不良的Claypan和Wooded Slopes等不同排水条件。这种设计既能反映区域内土壤和环境条件的异质性，也考虑了历史与现行农业耕作对土壤健康的累积影响（如Claypan地区表土流失约一半）。如此布局有助于揭示各类土壤和管理方案下土壤健康指标与玉米产量的关联，并为应对区域泥沙、养分和农药流失等环境保护目标提供科学基础。

These nuanced relationships are regionally dependent (Oldfield et al., 2019), and further research is needed to confirm whether these observations translate to regional evaluations, and develop a quantitative interpretation that identifies conditions where improved soil health leads to improved productivity. Achieving these goals would launch soil health metrics from research-based applications to “boots-on-the-ground” agronomic implementation. The objectives of this research were to (1) determine which soil health indicators are connected to productivity in Missouri corn cropping systems and (2) establish interpretive benchmarks for Missouri corn production.  

![](images/e4dde4de92c79d9d2979ff02b5e95f84c217bd0a3fbc5ef69e8d0f9e951e7cc6.jpg)  
F I G U R E 1 A map of Missouri soil regions by Major Land Resource Areas (MLRA) and geolocation of fields with established monitoring sites for yield collection  

# 2 MATERIALS AND METHODS  

# 2.1 Site description and experimental design  

Research was implemented across 84 fields in mid-Missouri between 2018 and 2020. The research encompassed central Missouri (Figure 1) and spanned across six Major Land Resource Areas (MLRA) primarily classified as Mollisol and Alfisol soils with predominantly smectitic clay mineralogy (NRCS-SSURGO). Soil conditions are variable with moderately drained or well-drained soils in the Deep Loess Hills (107B) or Heavy Till Plain (109) or poorly drained soils in the Claypan (113) and Wooded Slopes (115B; Table 1). Legacy impacts from current and historical cropping practices are abundant in the area, with estimates that claypan soils have lost nearly one-half of their original topsoil (Bird & Miller 1960). Further, addressing environmental concerns from offsite transport of sediment, nutrient, and herbicides from cropping fields into regional watersheds are some of the priority federal and state conservation objectives (Baffaut et al., 2020; Sadler et al., 2015; Willett et al., 2012).  

Grain yield productivity data were extracted from an established soil fertility trial where three to six fertilizer response trials (“monitoring sites”) were established in each field.

question: 在本研究的校准和验证数据集中，逐步线性回归、条件推断森林和随机森林三种模型哪一种在解释玉米产量方面表现最好？结合表格数据指出其R²和RMSE表现，并简要分析其潜在优点。
answer: 在校准和验证数据集中，随机森林模型在解释玉米产量方面表现最好。根据表格数据，随机森林在校准数据集上的R²为0.45，RMSE为1.5 Mg ha-1；在验证数据集上的R²为0.46，RMSE为1.4 Mg ha-1。其优点在于能够捕捉变量间的非线性关系，模型鲁棒性较高，相较于传统的逐步线性回归和条件推断森林，能够更好地拟合复杂的土壤健康与产量之间的关系。
